name: detect-is-on-glitch
description: Check if your code is executing on Glitch

scripts.make-dist: shx mkdir dist && cd dist && shx mkdir browser
scripts.prebuild: shx rm -rf dist && yarn make-dist && shx rm 'src/**/*.d.ts' || shx true
scripts.build-web: parcel build src/index.js --target browser --out-dir dist/browser --out-file glitch-detect.min.js --global detectIsOnGlitch --experimental-scope-hoisting
